summary.what: Renamed prompt command to draft, added ADR decision-log template, surfaced draft in prime output
summary.why: Prompt is developer jargon that undersells document generation — draft reads as the action it performs. Decision-log template fills the biggest gap: why-field data is uniquely suited to ADR extraction. Prime omitted document generation entirely, so agents reached for export|pipe instead of discovering draft.
summary.how: Cherry-picked from dogfood changelog branch onto main. Changed cobra Use/Short/Long in prompt.go, updated error message and examples. Added decision-log.md template with ADR-N format. Added Generating Documents section to prime defaultWorkflowContent. Dropped the changelog command itself as redundant with draft changelog template.
